question: Dear Doctor,I am 36 male and having IDDM since last 10 years. Currently I am facing the problem of very low semen volume. Since last 6 months, the quantity is reduced to 2-3 small drops or nothing at all. I have ED problem and using Viagra. Please tell me that why this quantity is reduced or finished.Is it due to Diabetes? Is there any medication which can improve the volume?Anxiously waiting for reply.regards,
title: Low Semen Quantity/ volume
